message:
SYSTEM: AMPER08_-_Introduction_to_SPARQL.pdf: Página 29
RDF(S) Access APIs, May 2008
29
© García-Castro, Corcho, Muñoz-García
SPARQL query forms
• SELECT
– Returns all, or a subset of, the variables bound in a query pattern 
match.
• CONSTRUCT
– Returns an RDF graph constructed by substituting variables in a set 
of triple templates.
• ASK
– Returns a boolean indicating whether a query pattern matches or not.
• DESCRIBE
– Returns an RDF graph that describes the resources found.
speaker: SYSTEM
